title: SerialInterface.0.91.1
description: This schema defines an asynchronous serial interface resource.
specification: This resource shall be used to represent serial resources as part of the Redfish specification.

SignalType.description: The type of signal used for the communication connection - RS232 or RS485.
SignalType.specification: This property shall indicate the type of serial signalling that will be utilized for the serial connection.

BitRate.description: The receive and transmit rate of data flow, typically in bits-per-second (bps), over the serial connection.
BitRate.specification: This property shall indicate the transmit and receive speed of the serial connection.

Parity.description: The type of parity used by the sender and receiver in order to detect errors over the serial connection.
Parity.specification: This property shall indicate parity information for a serial connection.

DataBits.description: The number of data bits that will follow the start bit over the serial connection.
DataBits.specification: This property shall indicate number of data bits for the serial connection.

StopBits.description: The period of time before the next start bit is transmitted.
StopBits.specification: This property shall indicate the stop bits for the serial connection.

enumDescriptions.Hardware: Out of band flow control imposed

FlowControl.description: The type of flow control, if any, that will be imposed on the serial connection.
FlowControl.specification: This property shall indicate the flow control mechanism for the serial connection.

PinOut.description: The physical pin configuration needed for a serial connector.
PinOut.specification: This property shall indicate the physical pin out for the serial connection.

self.description: This is the URI of this resource.
self.specification: The value of this property shall reference a resource of type serialInterface and shall point to this same resource.
